title: Identification and Application of Design Patterns in International Collaborative Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental design pattern concepts and international collaborative learning experience
context.additional_context: Developing learning patterns considering cultural differences in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Analyze problem situations in an international collaborative learning environment and identify at least 3 appropriate design patterns
Extract culturally independent core values and design internationally universal design patterns
Develop design pattern artifacts linked to learning behaviors using real-time online collaboration tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
